tool_description: Manages SSL certificates for domains including provisioning, renewal, and validation across multiple certificate authorities.

domain_names.description: List of domains to manage certificates for

error_messages: Domain validation failed: Unable to validate domain ownership using specified method.
Certificate authority error: Selected CA is not responding or temporarily unavailable.
Rate limit exceeded: Certificate request limit reached for this domain/CA combination.
DNS validation timeout: DNS TXT record not found or propagation incomplete.
Invalid domain format: One or more domains are not valid for SSL certificate issuance.
Wildcard validation required: Wildcard certificates require DNS validation method.
usage: Provide domain list and select certificate authority and validation method. Configure auto-renewal and wildcard options. The tool handles certificate provisioning and management.

certificates_issued.description: List of domains with successfully issued certificates

expiration_dates.description: Certificate expiration dates in ISO format
